name: Two Smudges In Infrared
description:
Audio log retrieved from derelict mech.
Identified as Charon Unit 41 ("Coradini").
Voice matching... Voice ID Positive.
Resuscitation subject #2, Copilot Kathryn Yate.
Initiate playback.

-

Made for Bitsy Mech Jam

Thank you to Adam for making Bitsy, Max for making ImageToBitsy, and Sean for hacking it and putting up with my constant calls for help
